artisan.abilityText:
Gain a card to your hand costing up to 5 Treasure.
Put a card from your hand onto your deck.

bandit.abilityText: Gain a Gold. Each other player reveals the top 2 cards of their deck, trashes a revealed Treasure other than Copper, and discards the rest.

bureaucrat.abilityText: Gain a Silver onto your deck. Each other player reveals a Victory card from their hand and puts it onto their deck (or reveals a hand with no Victory cards).

cellar.abilityText:
+1 Action
Discard any number of cards. +1 Card per card discarded.

chapel.abilityText: Trash up to 4 cards from your hand.

council-room.abilityText:
+4 Cards
+1 Buy
Each other player draws a card.

gardens.abilityText: Worth 1 Victory for every 10 cards in your deck rounded down.

harbinger.abilityText:
+1 Card
+1 Action
Look through your discard pile. You may put a card from it onto your deck.

library.abilityText: Draw until you have 7 cards in hand, skipping any Action cards you choose to; set those aside, discarding them afterward.

merchant.abilityText:
+1 Card
+1 Action
The first time you play a Silver this turn, +1 Treasure.

militia.abilityText:
+2 Treasure
Each other player discards down to 3 cards in hand.

mine.abilityText: You may trash a Treasure from your hand. Gain a Treasure to your hand costing up to 3 Treasure more than it.

moat.abilityText:
+2 Cards
--------------
When another player plays an Attack card, you may first reveal this from your hand, to be unaffected by it.

moneylender.abilityText: You may trash a Copper from your hand for +3 Treasure.

poacher.abilityText:
+1 Card
+1 Action
+1 Treasure
Discard a card per empty Supply pile.

remodel.abilityText: Trash a card from your hand. Gain a card costing up to 2 Treasure more than it.

sentry.abilityText:
+1 Card
+1 Action
Look at the top 2 cards of your deck. Trash and/or discard any number of them. Put the rest back on top in any order.

throne-room.abilityText: You may play an Action card from your hand twice.

vassal.abilityText:
+2 Treasure
Discard the top card of your deck. If it's an Action card, you may play it.

witch.abilityText:
+2 Cards
Each other player gains a Curse.

workshop.abilityText: Gain a card costing up to 4 Treasure.
